body_html:
@vrv, Other hardware guys (eg @DavidNorman ) might need something else, but all I need is,

diff --git a/tensorflow/tools/pip_package/BUILD b/tensorflow/tools/pip_package/BUILD
index 6a3f66b..c88840a 100644
--- a/tensorflow/tools/pip_package/BUILD
+++ b/tensorflow/tools/pip_package/BUILD
@@ -26,6 +26,8 @@ transitive_hdrs(
         "//tensorflow/core:core_cpu",
         "//tensorflow/core:framework",
         "//tensorflow/core:lib",
+        "//tensorflow/core:proto_text",
+        "//tensorflow/core:all_kernels",
         "//tensorflow/core:protos_all_cc",
         "//tensorflow/core:stream_executor",
         "//third_party/eigen3",

With that patch, I can do everything I need. @yaroslavvb, we haven't needed to do too many hacks that weren't already present in GPU code. Once I figured out the general core of TF, porting was pretty straight forward.

body:
@vrv, Other hardware guys (eg @DavidNorman ) might need something else, but all I need is,
```
diff --git a/tensorflow/tools/pip_package/BUILD b/tensorflow/tools/pip_package/BUILD
index 6a3f66b..c88840a 100644
--- a/tensorflow/tools/pip_package/BUILD
+++ b/tensorflow/tools/pip_package/BUILD
@@ -26,6 +26,8 @@ transitive_hdrs(
         "//tensorflow/core:core_cpu",
         "//tensorflow/core:framework",
         "//tensorflow/core:lib",
+        "//tensorflow/core:proto_text",
+        "//tensorflow/core:all_kernels",
         "//tensorflow/core:protos_all_cc",
         "//tensorflow/core:stream_executor",
         "//third_party/eigen3",
```

With that patch, I can do everything I need. @yaroslavvb, we haven't needed to do too many hacks that weren't already present in GPU code. Once I figured out the general core of TF, porting was pretty straight forward.
